title: Kanye West recorded his album in Wyoming and is selling Wyoming Ye merch. What impact does Kanye have on Wyoming? - Quora

response.answer_text: From one 19–year old Wyoming native just now: “We are so over it. Because he came here and used Wyoming to improve his image, now people out there think Wyoming is a thing and want to come here.” Just three nights ago, she and her boyfriend went to the Ned LeDoux concert at the base of Snow King Mountain. My ski shuttle bus passengers were excited about the news of him and his celebrity partner during the winter but many of us just don’t understand why rap is still with is after all these years. Many suspect creativity in musical innovation began to atrophy in the 1990s. A great percentage of Wyoming residents already disrespect Teton County as “the fake west” because of fame, beauty, commercialization and Hollywood types. It is an exaggeration and does not do justice to what real West is but I expect this non event will deepen the rift.  That Wyoming Ranch Kanye Took Over Hated Having Him Kanye West Loves His Wyoming Getaway, But the Feeling Is Not Mutual: "No More Rappers"

Truthfully I hope none. I despise this man,I despise his wife,so for me I don’t want hm associated with Wyoming in any way shape or form. That being said it’s very understandable why he chose Jackson, because as I have said before most of the rest of us that live here(especially ones like me that multi-generational)aren’t sure if Jackson is a part of Wyoming. This town is a weird mixture of extreme liberalism and conservatism. I’m just glad that most people have short memories and it will be forgotten that he was ever here.
